dict.acceptation: [关系代词，意义相当于 who…not, which…not]；

sent.orig: But discounts on shipping made through best offer are invalid and wont be honored.
sent.trans: But折扣航运通过提供最好的习惯是无效的，兑现折扣。

sent.orig: All subjects were examined tear film pattern and invasive tear break up time (BUT) .
sent.trans: 分别观察两组泪膜形态及侵犯性泪膜破裂时间(BUT)。

sent.orig: All examined with tear break up time(BUT), Schirmer I test(SIt),rose bengal(RB) staining.
sent.trans: 所有患者组和对照组均行泪膜破裂时间(break up time ,BUT),Schirmer I试验(SchirmerI test,SIt)和虎红染色检查。
象‘and’，‘but’，‘because’这样一类词是连接词。
